attributes.action: Legalise self-owned electric unicycles and scooters
attributes.additional_details: Electric personal transport is rapidly becoming popular as a green way to travel/commute and could considerably reduce the use of cars. They’re available right now so would help accelerate pollution reduction during the considerable time before internal combustion engines cease to be in widespread use (the 2030/35 ban only applies to sales of new vehicles). Parliament should also consider related issues such as 3rd party insurance and minimum safety equipment required for riders.
attributes.background: Legalise the use of electric unicycles and electric scooters on either public roads, pavements or both.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action:

Legalize the use of e-scooters where bikes can be used.

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/583107
